page.title: 01GAZETTEER,SPETCHLEY
page.content: This part of Hereford and Worcester county is quiet,rural and steeped in its historical past. Dominated by the 5,500 acre estate of the Berkeley family who reside at Spetchley Hall to the west of our grid,the area seems little touched by the proximity of Worcester city but uses its services. {Civil parishes:}Spetchley,Bredicot, Churchill and Whittington {Hamlets:}Sneachill ,Spetchley Bredicot ,Whittington { {Landscape:}Gentle hills and deciduous woodland set in arable and pastoral farmland.Parkland, orchards. {Geology:}To the West is Worcestershire (Keuper) marl. To the East are Lias clays ,sands and gravels on the soils up to the Bow Brook. {Access:}Road M5,Junctn 7, or A422 or Rail, to Worcester Shrub Hill Stn. {Employment}Farming,forestry,commuting.
